title: Swing Trade Setup Generator
description: Get optimal swing trade setups based on technical indicators.
prompt: Generate swing trade setups using the following stock symbol: {{stock_symbol}}. Consider the preferred timeframe of {{timeframe}}, and apply these indicators: {{indicators}}. Suggest entry price, stop-loss, and target zones.

title: Breakout Scanner Prompt
description: Identify potential breakout trades based on volume & price action.
prompt: Scan for breakout opportunities on timeframe {{timeframe}} using price action rules and volume spikes. Focus on sector: {{sector}} and signal: {{signal_type}}.

inputs.name: sector
inputs.description: Sector to focus on (e.g., Tech, Energy)

inputs.name: signal_type
inputs.description: Type of breakout signal (e.g., flag, wedge)

title: Backtest Trading Strategy
description: Backtest your trading strategy using past data.
prompt: Backtest this trading strategy: {{strategy_description}} on {{stock_symbol}} over the last {{duration}} using {{timeframe}} data. Show win/loss ratio, drawdown, and equity curve summary.

title: Price Action Trade Ideas
description: Generate trade ideas using pure price action techniques.
prompt: Using pure price action, generate 3 trade ideas for {{stock_symbol}} on the {{timeframe}} timeframe. Use recent swing highs/lows and candle patterns like {{patterns}}.

inputs.name: patterns
inputs.description: Price action patterns to focus on

title: Trading Journal Analyzer
description: Analyze your trading journal to find strengths and weaknesses.
prompt: Analyze the following trading journal: {{trading_journal}}. Summarize top mistakes, profitable setups, win rate, and emotional patterns. Suggest improvements.

inputs.name: trading_journal
inputs.description: Paste your trading journal notes or summary

title: Intraday Trading Signal Generator
description: Get intraday trading signals based on scalping techniques.
prompt: Based on {{stock_symbol}}, generate intraday trading signals for the {{timeframe}} timeframe. Use scalping techniques with {{indicators}} and give clear entry, exit, and stop-loss levels.

title: Multi-Timeframe Trade Validator
description: Check trade idea validity across multiple timeframes.
prompt: Validate the trade idea: {{trade_idea}} using the following timeframes: {{timeframes}}. Focus on trend alignment, confluence, and risk zones.

title: Trade Risk Calculator
description: Calculate position size, risk-reward ratio, and stop loss.
prompt: For a trading account of size ${{account_size}}, calculate the ideal position size, entry price, stop loss, and take profit based on risk percentage {{risk_percent}} and entry at {{entry_price}} with stop at {{stop_price}}.

title: Sector Rotation Analyzer
description: Find which sectors are gaining or losing strength.
prompt: Analyze sector rotation trends over the last {{duration}}. Identify strong vs weak sectors and suggest long/short trade ideas using ETFs or top sector stocks.

title: Macroeconomic Event Trade Plan
description: Create a trade plan around an upcoming macroeconomic event.
prompt: Build a trade plan for the event: {{event_name}} scheduled on {{event_date}}. Include potential market reaction, asset impact (like {{assets}}), and pre-event vs post-event trading strategies.

inputs.name: event_name
inputs.description: Name of the event (e.g., FOMC, CPI)
